text: Cayman Airways is the flag carrier of the Cayman Islands. Its main office and largest hub is in Grand Cayman. ==History== Cayman Airways started flying on August 7, 1968. The airline's first plane was a Douglas DC-3. It's first international charter flight to Miami International Airport was in 1972. In 1978, the airline bought its first jet - the BAC 1-11. As of 2015, Cayman Airways has 5 airplanes. ==Gallery== File:Cayman Airways BAC 111-531FS One- Eleven at Miami International Airport.jpg|A BAC 111 of Cayman Airways File:VP- CKY Boeing 737 Cayman Airways (7465141722).jpg|The Boeing 737 is now the main aircraft in the airline's fleet. |The airline's logo ==References== Category:1968 establishments Category:Airlines of the United Kingdom Category:Cayman Islands
title: Cayman Airways
